 0. You just DO WHAT THE FUCK YOU WANT TO.

Thanks for using MyVoice.
Developed by Manuel Wildauer.

Feel free to fork, modify and have fun with it :)
The pitch. 1 is the normal pitch, lower values lower the tone of the synthesized voice, greater values increase it.
The speech rate. 1 is the normal speed, lower values slow down the speech (0.5 is half the normal speech rate), greater values accelerate it .
